title: I Don't Know How She Does* It: Field Notes for Gender Studies in Entrepreneurship
description: This special "best of" selection of LiisBeth's Field Notes for feminist Entrepreneurs. LiisBeth is an independent media voice examining entrepreneurship, start-up culture and the innovation eco-systems through a progressive, feminist lens.The articles in this booklet profile the thoughts and experiences of four unique Toronto entrepreneurs. Their stories were selected for their ability to illuminate the role that gender, age, values and identity play in defining one's approach to entrepreneurship and venture creation.This booklet was intended to serve as a conversation starter in entrepreneurship and/or gender studies seminars. Included are questions for guided reflections, additional readings, as well as links and resources for women* entrepreneurs.
author: Petra Kassun-Mutch
